评论详情: Was a Christmas present for My granddaughters
I love it it’s cute
And definitely fits the Y2K aesthetic. The print is cool and abstract and the material is soft and stretchy. Love it
This shirt definitely has a y2k, emo feel. I love it! The print is high quality and the shirt is opaque. It's very lightweight, but it can be styled with so many things.
5.0 super cute and comfortable came as shown sizing is correct held up in wash would recommened
comfortable, nice lettering and fits perfect

评论概述: Women Vintage Y2K Long Sleeve Shirt Review
评论详情: My teen absolutely loves this Women Vintage Y2K Long Sleeve Shirt! It’s soft, cozy, and fits perfectly. The style is on point with its skull and fairy grunge graphic, and the fabric has a good amount of stretch, making it super comfortable for all-day wear. She loves how unique the design looks with her outfits, and it pairs well with a variety of accessories.  The only issue was that the material is thinner than expected, so it’s more suitable for layering or milder weather. Overall, it's a great shirt for anyone into that vintage, edgy aesthetic. A total win for a Y2K-inspired wardrobe!

评论概述: Fits well, good arm and torso length
评论详情: The material doesn't quite look or feel like I thought it would, but note it's polyester. I have a really hard time finding long sleeve shirts that are skinny enough in the mid section, yet long armed to my wrists or to my waistline. This had both! For reference, I'm 5'8" but about 112lb. Mediums usually have the fit for that criteria, but are too big in the middle. So, I usually have to go small and hope for the best or go Medium and it is oversized. This fit, in a small! It deffinatly won't be warm enough in winter, but would be good in fall depending on your cold comfort level. I have washed this twice and it's held up well. I find the material rather itchy, I do however have sensitive skin. I think with a tank top underneath it might be ok. I would buy again, it is a good deal for the price, but if you have sensitive skin it may be worth considering a different fabric.
Although I have no idea what the letters on the shirt is supposed to mean, I got it to go with the rest of my goth wardrobe. The shirt is very soft and comfortable then fits just as it should.

This is a cute top, it's a thinner material but is not see-through. The design is nice and I love the low neckline. For some reason I thought the material would be stretchier but it's not. It has some give/stretch to it but for long-sleeved shirts I prefer it to have more stretch so it doesn't feel restrictive when I move my arms around. It's true to size and seems well made.
Super cute and nice fit not very baggy. It is good quality and comfortable. Perfect!
I got this for my goddaughter and she loves it. She loves the gothic look. It fits well and the material is decent. It washes without shrinking.

I love the style of this top with the inside out seams. There are some compromising loose threads, but not difficult to fix. The print quality is even, but low definition. The fit is great, thank you~

The a3 grunge dark grey long sleeved shirt is made of thin fabric, but fits well. It is super comfy. It will not be a warm shirt for winter, but is a nice shirt to wear under a hoodie or on a day that only has a little chill. The best thing about this long-sleeved shirt is that the sleeves actually go past my wrists even when I bend my arms! I can never find a long sleeved shirt that has long enough sleeves, so this makes me very happy.
Good fit - very soft, stretchy material and a good graphic imprint. It's kind of a ribbed t-shirt material.  Not super high quality - but a good themed kick around the house shirt

The overall fit isn't bad, it is best as a primary wear shirt with an under shirt/tank top. It is a bit tight wearing with a t shirt. Overall the feel is nice and soft. No fading issues after washing for the first time. I received this product as a part of Amazon Vine.

评论概述: Teen loves it. Thin stretchy fabric. Cold grey color
评论详情: I ordered this skull shirt for my teen daughter and she loves it. It is a thin (slightly see-through) stretchy fabric. It is sewn well, no issues. The skull graphic matches the listing photos and is great quality. The shirt color differs though. In the photos it looks like a warm grey, but it is a cold grey color. It is nice and has a stonewashed? look to it. The size chart is accurate and it fits as shown. It is really comfortable. It’s a good value for a long sleeve graphic shirt.

评论概述: Item is not the same as the picture
评论详情: In the image, this shirt looks like it has some texture in the material with screen printed images. The picture of the neckline shows stray threads like a distressed fabric and the inside looks grey. The actual item is just cheap material with the texture and images just printed on. The seams are not distressed as in the picture and the inside is bright white which shows at each seam. This shirt is nothing like I expected it to be and it is completely unwearable for me.

I’m very disappointed with this T-shirt. First, I’ll give you the good things. The design was interesting and the T-shirt fit as expected. That being said, the fabric is extremely low quality. The T-shirt is very cheaply made. The seams are raw and not finished which gives the shirt a sloppy look. I will not be getting other items from this company.

Got this for my wife, she used to wear clothes like this. She has sensitive skin and said it needs an undershirt for her. She said it probably wouldn't bother most people, but for her it's a little itchy after while. Fits baggy, and the image is certainly faded (intentionally).

I've been looking for a shirt like this for a while and this one is perfect.  I am 5' 5" and 130ish pounds and I ordered a small which fit me really well.  Its fabric is soft and stretchy enough not to feel suffocating even with a tight fit.  It's low cut enough to show off you y2k themed bra.  This shirt is great for a retro-y themed look or just to wear everyday.

From the photo, it looks like this would be a thicker material, such as that of long johns or a thin sweat shirt, but it’s not.  It’s very thin with no print on the underside of the garment. The material isn’t soft at all and made with some type of spandex and it clings to every roll and imperfection on your body. I would not wear it outside the house for this reason.  I was looking for something more loose and comfy to fit like it does in the model in the photo. I’d have to buy it a couple sizes too big for it to fit like that.  It’s a shame because the print is nice and it could have been a great shirt otherwise.
I'm going to wear this in the Halloween season.  It's just perfect.  Comfortable and soft.  I recommend.

The design of this Goth shirt is cute. I ordered a size small. For reference, I am 5'2" and weigh 100 pounds. The fit is a little snug--I like roomier fits and should have sized up. This is tunic length, reaching below my hips. The seams have a raw finish. This is a problem at the hem, where the lack of a true hem causes the bottom to roll up. The material is thin, probably not warm enough for cold weather wear. I'll keep it for the design despite the negative qualities.
Size fits slim as a large, I wear a 12, has stretch. Is very comfortable. Low front. Cute top

This graphic tee with long sleeves is going to be perfect for fall. It feels like a real shirt, not like cheap polyester, and fits me very nicely. The graphic looks very clean even though I’m not sure what it’s supposed to say it’s cute anyway. I am in between a small and medium and got a medium, it fits great.

It’s more of a glossy type than the cotton I wanted. It’s a 9$ shirt so it’s fine the design is about the same. The extra darker background art is more black than a faded dark brown. It’s a fine cute shirt but def a 2 for the pic provided. The material is thick for a long sleeve which is a big plus.
The shirt fits great and it is true to size would purchase again
Style.
